name: Whitehaven Beach All Day
description: Experience the Whitsundays in style aboard Super Flyer, your floating beach club for the day. Cruise through the turquoise waters and feel the salty breeze as you set foot on the pure, white silica sands of Whitehaven Beach. This adventure is perfect for beach lovers and those seeking relaxation, with unlimited transfers between the boat and beach, allowing you to explore at your own pace. Enjoy a guided walk to the breathtaking South Whitehaven Lookout and savor a delicious buffet lunch onboard, making it a memorable day on one of the world's most iconic beaches.
includes:
Unlimited beach-to-boat transfers
Lunch and snacks
Stinger suit
Guided walk to South Whitehaven Lookout
highlights:
Unlimited transfers between the boat and beach
Relax on the white sands of Whitehaven Beach
Guided walk to South Whitehaven Lookout
Onboard buffet lunch
Onboard bar and sun lounges
Large inside area with comfortable seating
Adults only area on top deck
On-demand transfers for maximum flexibility
price_tiers: Adult: FROM A$229 | Child (4+): A$179 | Age 1 to 3: Free
menu:
**Menu:**
- Fresh salads
- Various meats
- Vegetables
- Selection of snacks
ideal_for: Beach lovers, families, and those seeking a relaxing day in the Whitsundays
important_information: ['Children aged 1 to 3 are free.', 'Children aged 4 and above require a ticket.']

cancellation_policy: 100% Refund up to 24 hours before departure.

name: Super Flyer Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel
description: Experience the Whitsundays like never before aboard the Super Flyer, a floating beach club designed for adventure and relaxation. This tour combines the thrill of snorkeling at vibrant coral reefs with the serene beauty of Whitehaven Beach's pure silica sands. Perfect for families, couples, and solo adventurers, this tour offers unlimited transfers between the boat and the beach, allowing you to explore at your own pace. With comfortable seating, an onboard bar, and sun lounges, Super Flyer ensures a memorable day full of sun, sea, and stunning landscapes.
includes:
Snorkeling coral reefs in the Whitsunday Islands
Unlimited transfers between the boat and Whitehaven Beach
Lunch and snacks served onboard
Stinger suit and snorkel equipment
Guided walks and snorkeling adventures
Access to sun lounges on the boat
Onboard bar and coffee machine (pay onboard)
highlights:
Cruise through the turquoise waters of the Whitsundays
Visit the iconic Whitehaven Beach with its pure white silica sands
Snorkeling adventure at a coral reef location known for vibrant marine life
Unlimited on-demand transfers between the boat and the beach
Spacious and comfortable seating areas on the Super Flyer
Adults-only area on the top deck
Dedicated snorkeling boat for easy access to coral reefs
price_tiers: Adult (15+): A$259 | Child (4-14): A$199 | Infant (3 and under): Free
ideal_for: Families, couples, solo adventurers, and anyone looking to explore the Whitsundays in style and comfort.
important_information: ['Adults From (15+) $259', 'Children (4 to 14) $199', 'Infants 3 Months to 3 Free.', 'Parents will be split over 2 different snorkelling sessions.']
cancellation_policy: 100% Refund up to 24 hours before departure.
